description: Retrieves the specified Amazon Braket job.

parameters.name: additionalAttributeNames
parameters.description: A list of attributes to return information for. (string) ---

parameters.name: jobArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the job to retrieve.

nested_items.name: algorithmSpecification
nested_items.description: Definition of the Amazon Braket job created. Specifies the container image the job uses, information about the Python scripts used for entry and training, and the user-defined metrics used to evaluation the job.

nested_items.name: containerImage
nested_items.description: The container image used to create an Amazon Braket job.

nested_items.name: uri
nested_items.description: The URI locating the container image.

nested_items.name: scriptModeConfig
nested_items.description: Configures the paths to the Python scripts used for entry and training.

nested_items.name: compressionType
nested_items.description: The type of compression used by the Python scripts for an Amazon Braket job.

nested_items.name: entryPoint
nested_items.description: The path to the Python script that serves as the entry point for an Amazon Braket job.

nested_items.name: s3Uri
nested_items.description: The URI that specifies the S3 path to the Python script module that contains the training script used by an Amazon Braket job.

nested_items.name: associations
nested_items.description: The list of Amazon Braket resources associated with the hybrid job.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Braket resource arn.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The association type for the specified Amazon Braket resource arn.

nested_items.name: billableDuration
nested_items.description: The billable time the Amazon Braket job used to complete.

nested_items.name: checkpointConfig
nested_items.description: Information about the output locations for job checkpoint data.

nested_items.name: localPath
nested_items.description: (Optional) The local directory where checkpoints are written. The default directory is /opt/braket/checkpoints/.

nested_items.name: s3Uri
nested_items.description: Identifies the S3 path where you want Amazon Braket to store checkpoints. For example, s3://bucket-name/key-name-prefix.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the Amazon Braket job was created.

nested_items.name: deviceConfig
nested_items.description: The quantum processing unit (QPU) or simulator used to run the Amazon Braket job.

nested_items.name: device
nested_items.description: The primary quantum processing unit (QPU) or simulator used to create and run an Amazon Braket job.

nested_items.name: endedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the Amazon Braket job ended.

nested_items.name: events
nested_items.description: Details about the type and time events occurred related to the Amazon Braket job.

nested_items.name: eventType
nested_items.description: The type of event that occurred related to the Amazon Braket job.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: A message describing the event that occurred related to the Amazon Braket job.

nested_items.name: timeOfEvent
nested_items.description: The type of event that occurred related to the Amazon Braket job.

nested_items.name: failureReason
nested_items.description: A description of the reason why an Amazon Braket job failed, if it failed.

nested_items.name: hyperParameters
nested_items.description: Algorithm-specific parameters used by an Amazon Braket job that influence the quality of the traiing job. The values are set with a string of JSON key:value pairs, where the key is the name of the hyperparameter and the value is the value of th hyperparameter.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: inputDataConfig
nested_items.description: A list of parameters that specify the name and type of input data and where it is located.

nested_items.name: channelName
nested_items.description: A named input source that an Amazon Braket job can consume.

nested_items.name: contentType
nested_items.description: The MIME type of the data.

nested_items.name: dataSource
nested_items.description: The location of the channel data.

nested_items.name: s3DataSource
nested_items.description: Information about the data stored in Amazon S3 used by the Amazon Braket job.

nested_items.name: s3Uri
nested_items.description: Depending on the value specified for the S3DataType, identifies either a key name prefix or a manifest that locates the S3 data source.

nested_items.name: instanceConfig
nested_items.description: The resource instances to use while running the hybrid job on Amazon Braket.

nested_items.name: instanceCount
nested_items.description: Configures the number of resource instances to use while running an Amazon Braket job on Amazon Braket. The default value is 1.

nested_items.name: instanceType
nested_items.description: Configures the type resource instances to use while running an Amazon Braket hybrid job.

nested_items.name: volumeSizeInGb
nested_items.description: The size of the storage volume, in GB, that user wants to provision.

nested_items.name: jobArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Amazon Braket job.

nested_items.name: jobName
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon Braket job.

nested_items.name: outputDataConfig
nested_items.description: The path to the S3 location where job artifacts are stored and the encryption key used to store them there.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) key that Amazon Braket uses to encrypt the job training artifacts at rest using Amazon S3 server-side encryption.

nested_items.name: s3Path
nested_items.description: Identifies the S3 path where you want Amazon Braket to store the job training artifacts. For example, s3://bucket-name/key-name-prefix.

nested_items.name: queueInfo
nested_items.description: Queue information for the requested job. Only returned if QueueInfo is specified in the additionalAttributeNames" field in the GetJob API request.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: Optional. Provides more information about the queue position. For example, if the job is complete and no longer in the queue, the message field contains that information.

nested_items.name: position
nested_items.description: Current position of the job in the jobs queue.

nested_items.name: queue
nested_items.description: The name of the queue.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that Amazon Braket can assume to perform tasks on behalf of a user. It can access user resources, run an Amazon Braket job container on behalf of user, and output resources to the s3 buckets of a user.

nested_items.name: startedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the Amazon Braket job was started.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the Amazon Braket job.

nested_items.name: stoppingCondition
nested_items.description: The user-defined criteria that specifies when to stop a job running.

nested_items.name: maxRuntimeInSeconds
nested_items.description: The maximum length of time, in seconds, that an Amazon Braket job can run.
(string) ---
(string) ---
